title: New: Ifan Dafydd – No good/Miranda
body:
**Ifan Dafydd** is a producer who’s been increasingly surrounded in mystery.

[**Abeano**](http://www.abeano.com/ifan-dafydd-no-good-miranda/) posted an interesting little article yesterday playing with the idea that Dafydd could very well be the alter ego of James Blake. Seems unlikely, and after **Abeano** themselves dug a little deeper it became clear that the story wasn’t perhaps so mysterious. That hasn’t stopped Dafydd being a subject of intrigue however. His music has a very similar style to the early **James Blake** remixes, taking well known tunes, from the likes of **Amy Winehouse**, and turning them into something altogether more jerky and dazed. Check out the 2 tracks below.

 [Ifan Dafydd – No good (Original)](http://soundcloud.com/svimp/ifan-dafydd-no-good) by [Svimp](http://soundcloud.com/svimp)

 [Ifan Dafydd – Miranda](http://soundcloud.com/overmuziek/ifan-dafydd-miranda) by [overmuziek](http://soundcloud.com/overmuziek)
